EmailTemplate.subject: The Challenge 2015 - Up to 3,500 roles available this year!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Please do not respond to this email. The email was sent from an unattended mailbox and responses are not reviewed. Please instead contact the Staffing Team on seasonalroles@the-challenge.org. THE CHALLENGE 2015 - UP TO 3,500 NCS PROGRAMME ROLES THIS YEAR!
Dear {!Contact.FirstName}
We haven’t heard from you since you expressed an interest to work with us! Our applications are open. We have a number of locations and roles you could take part in.
Application form: https://staffing.the-challenge.org
What is The Challenge?
The Challenge is the UK’s largest provider of the National Citizen Service (NCS). We deliver exciting youth and community programmes which combine outdoor adventure, skill development and community volunteering.
In 2015, we aim to reach 25,000 young people, who will be supported by 3,500 seasonal staff members.
I’m in! How do I apply?
You will need to complete an application form on our Staffing Website. Our website allows you to manage and monitor your information easily.
Application form: https://staffing.the-challenge.org
Login Details
We have used the contact details you gave us to create a profile on the Staffing Website for you. Your login details are below:
Username: {!Contact.Email}
Password: {!Contact.Login_Password__c}
Our upcoming deadline is the 27th February. Applications submitted before this date will be fast-tracked and candidates will have a greater choice of assessment dates, if successful.
If you have any questions, please contact us on seasonalroles@the-challenge.org, quoting the email reference number below in any correspondence.
We look forward to receiving your application!
Best wishes,
NCS with The Challenge
seasonalroles@the-challenge.org
Email reference: CA 1.6 VISIT NCSTHECHALLENGE.ORG NOW
